title: Service Token (request)
description: Retrieves the authorization token for the specified service.

referrer.description: The URL of the web page where the Web SDK will be used.

service.description: The service name to retrieve the token for.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
